reviews.review_msg: We were supposed to have two classes per week with him. He divided our class in 4 groups, and each group had 15/20min class per week with him. However, he just sent us YouTube videos to watch before class and we only discussed our questions. In other words, he did not teach us anything, he only answered questions

By far the worst instructor I have ever had the displeasure of dealing with at this institution thus far throughout my entire undergraduate career. He does not care about your grade or if you even learn anything, just that he is right and you are wrong. Very inflexible and does not have any concern towards any of the students.
